CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The images of P1 , P3 , P4 , and P5 blends showed bicontinuous structures of polymer and PCBM as well as small - scale phase separation favorable for exciton dissociation.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer |
| PCBM |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are:

1. polymer
2. PCBM (which stands for [PCBM](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PCBM), or [Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phenyl-C61-butyric_acid_methyl_ester), an organic semiconductor material)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The images of P1 , P3 , P4 , and P5 blends showed bicontinuous structures of polymer and PCBM as well as small - scale phase separation favorable for exciton dissociation.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P5 |

Explanation:

The "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph are P1, P3, P4, and P5. These are the names of the images that were mentioned in the paragraph. They are referred to as properties, and they blend to form bicontinuous structures with PCBM, which is favorable for exciton dissociation.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| bicontinuous structures of polymer and PCBM |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the only clear reference to a "Material Property" is the "bicontinuous structures of polymer and PCBM". The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, namely P1, P3, P4, P5, and small-scale phase separation, do not clearly refer to material properties. Therefore, the only valid entity that can be presented as a "Material Property" is the "bicontinuous structures of polymer and PCBM".
